pr_title: Verify before getting element from a list

timeline.bodyText: may be replace size with parameter count in the error message?
timeline.author: phd3

timeline.message:
Verify before getting element from a list

We are witnessing spurious `ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException` when
accessing type parameter. Add verification that will produce more useful
failure message.
